title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Design and Implementation of Quality Assessment for Blended English Education at Vocational Colleges

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills in professional settings and understanding of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe a blended English education quality evaluation model by categorizing it into three assessment dimensions: instructional design, implementation, and learning outcomes.
Learners can apply a multi-attribute group decision-making (MAGDM) technique using intuitionistic fuzzy sets (IFS) to develop an educational quality assessment plan.
Learners can apply a quality evaluation process in practice by combining the CoCoSo methodology with distance measurement methods (Hamming, Euclidean, logarithmic distance).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
